text: Gradaterebra planecosta is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Gradaterebra planecosta (Barnard, 1958). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=1416777 on 2020-01-27 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== ==External links== * Barnard, K. title: Gradaterebra planecosta
